content.question: The parametric function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is defined by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>. If <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals 2 plus 3 cos t"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals 2 plus 4 sin t"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></math>, the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane has which of the following shapes?

choices.label: An ellipse that is not a circle

content.answer: An ellipse that is not a circle

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
